links.title: Tesla sued for $2 billion by hydrogen truck startup over alleged patent infringement
links.description: Nikola Motor Company has filed a lawsuit in Arizona alleging that Tesla's all-electric semi infringes on the hydrogen truck startup's patents. The lawsuit claims Tesla willfully copied these patents in creating its electric truck, and Nikola is seeking $2 billion in damages in return.
